When we booked the hotel we were a little worried about the noise level due to its proximity to Times Square but were not bothered once by noise. The room was clean and well appointed. Free water, coffee and wifi were included in the room price. The room also had a refrigerator which was nice to have cold water after walking miles. The staff was friendly, the gym was bigger than most and the elevators were speedy. An extra added touch was the rooftop bar Bar54.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: My husband and I stayed here for 4nights at the beginning of July. The staff were so friendly and helpful. Our room was lovely and spacious by New York standards. The room was well decorated and kept very clean. The bed was very large and comfortable. We had a big corner window looking down onto Times Square. With being so close to Times Square we were concerned that it could be very noisy at night but it wasn't the hotel room was very quiet. The location of this hotel was very convenient for most of the major sights and close to plenty of restaurants. I would definitely stay here again; it's great value for money x

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This hotel was exceptional! We were in the midst of everything. Literally a few steps from Times Square, a couple of blocks from 5th Avenue, a 5 minute walk from Grand Central Station, and right down the street from Minskoff Theatre! I loved it! This will be the only places I stay when I come back to NYC! The service was exceptional! The staff was exceptional! The hotel was exceptional!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Awesome room with enough space to walk around. Side view of Times Square. Which was perfect not to interrupt sleep. Large bathroom with handheld and a rain shower head. Loved the dry ball blow dryer. Comfy king size bed. Mini frig., free bottled, Keurig coffee maker and variety of selections of coffees. Very friendly and efficient staff. Clean hotel. Has a roof top seating with food and bar. We ate T-45 on 1st floor for breakfast and lunch. Our food was very good. Would highly recommend this hotel. They made us feel special!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We loved our stay here! Everyone at the hotel was friendly and gracious. The room was very nice with a great view. The elevators were incredibly fast and when the line was long the hotel staff took special care to move us through quickly. The rooftop bar was a delight, even though pricey. Walking distance to all the shows and Times Square sights.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The hotel is a very short walk to Times Square. Great location Walking distance to everything you might want to see and do. Hotel staff is very accommodating and the rooms are very clean and have everything you need for your stay including a great blow dryer :)

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Very nice hotel and great location! It's close to Times Square and the theater district. We would definitely consider staying there again. It's family-friendly as well. The rooms were clean and well-designed. The staff is well-trained.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Place is amazing...staff is spectacular...location is awesome. We arrived early and I was hoping to just check in my bag until check in...the fabulous girl at the desk got us right into a room. Everyone was super nice and helpful. Room (deluxe high floor king) was perfect and spacious with an amazing view and the bathroom was wonderful. I forgot a couple of things and they had them on hand and brought them right up. Location was perfect for NY tourist!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Had an incredible stay! Hotel is located steps from Times Square, which was ideal for me. Staff is top notch. Our room was great, right down to the heated bathroom floor. Will return again in the future for sure.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This is a top notch spot only a half a block from Times Square. Not far from some of the best restaurants in town and in the middle of everything else. Very friendly staff and wonderful roof top bar with beautiful iew.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: It would be hard to find a hotel with a better location for the centre of New York, than the Hyatt Centric Times Square. Although it is a relatively small hotel for a Hyatt, it provides almost all the tourist can want, perhaps with the exception of a pool to swim in.The rooms are a good size and surprisingly quiet given the location. They are clean and modern. The staff are friendly and when needed, helpful.My only slight disappointment was with the food offered at the in house restaurant, but given the range of choices in the immediate vicinity, this is not too much of a bother.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Family getaway with 2 grand children and this location and all the services were perfect!! Great view from 26th floor and for the adults awesome rooftop bar! Close proximity to all of our adventures! Love the ease of getting a taxi due to location on 45th!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I stay here about 15 times a year. the location is terrific, and the hotel is new and therefor the internet is fast , and there are power outlets everywhere you wan them. Also a walk in shower. But the real reason is that the staff are always helpful and happy. they seem to genuinely care about the guests, and seem to like their job. this comes form 3 things: good hiring, good training, and good management. A happy place with happy people !!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Place to go if you are planning to visit Times Square. close to 5th ave shops, theaters and museums. exceptional knowledgeable and friendly staff, but professional. hotel is wonderful, comfortable and clean.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Perfect hotel experience! Clean, close to theaters, great service! I would stay in this hotel again and would recommend to others. The bar on the 54 floor is a nice addition. Its indoor/outddoor, nice place to have guests visit.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I stayed at this hotel with my teenage son. The hotel has a clean modern look, comfortable beds, friendly staff. It is in a great location - steps away from Times Square. Would stay there again on my next visit to New York.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Hotel is centrally situated off Times Square, but without the crowd.Rooms are great, clean modern and fresh.Staff has always a smile, even if when I put them a bit under pressure.And the Skylounge bar is definitely worth visiting. Great stay, indeed.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: My three friends and I stayed here for one night. We arrived on a Friday afternoon. Our room was tastefully decorated, had plenty of amenities & was very comfortable. There is a lovely rooftop bar. We didn't check out any of the food but if you want a busy, touristy location, this is for you, right in the heart of Times Square. The weather was so awful that the location worked but my only complaint would be the location as crowds aren't my thing but for this excursion it worked well!!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: i took a long time on tripadvisor before selecting this hotel ,i was a little concerned because we were so close to times square,i had asked for a room not too far up around the 20th floor because my wife has suddenly developed a fear of heights , on arrival the manager checked us in we had a very room on the 27th , my wife asked if we could be on a lower floor , the lowest was on the 11th but manager said the room was not as good , i said no ,but my wife wanted to look at it , i was quiet surprised when i saw it ,it was over large enough 35 sq mt , quite ,my wife said we'll take it , i spend the whole holiday thinking what the original room would have been like!! ,the hotel was great ,the manager gave us a us dlr 75 food/bar credit to make up for the room change ,they have a bar on the top floor with great views , the only let down was the restaurants rather basic menu ,but with so many good ones all around you ,no problem

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We loved the location of the Hyatt Centric, as it is one block from Times Square - close enough to be part of the action without being in the middle of the craziness. Check-in was friendly and quick, and as a Hyatt Explorist, I was pleased to be offered the status benefits - like late checkout - without having to ask. That is rather unusual. So three cheers for great training and execution! The room was quite nice and roomy, especially by NYC standards. The bathroom was lovely and the bath amenities plentiful. My only complaint about the room was that there was no electrical outlet for the inside of the two beds. There were outlets on the outsides, but not for those sleeping in the middle of the room. That is a minor complaint, especially when there was a great desk across the room with extra outlets, but I do love to charge my cell phone and set my alarm while it's within arm's length. Again, though, that is a minor inconvenience, especially considering how wonderful the hotel was in every other way. Each staff member we encountered was very kind and seemed genuinely happy to be there - from the bell services folks to the front desk. Chocolate chip cookies offered at check-in were a great treat, as well! Overall, we look forward to another opportunity to enjoy this beautiful hotel!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The room was very good and the hotel is perfectly located. the rooms are not small and the room has everything you need to relax and rest from a day in NYC. I do recommend that you check the prices and if under your budget check this hotel. The roof top restaurant is just fantastic.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Literally 5 min walk from Time Square, the Hyatt Centric was an excellent choice for our 6 night stay. We easily navigated the subway uptown or downtown and were walking distance from Rockefeller Center and Radio City Music Hall. We were upgraded to a higher level corner room with an excellent view onto Broadway and the Paramount Building.The Rooftop Bar has amazing views and is well worth a visit. Housekeeping was amazing, our was always tip top when we got back from our day of sightseeing, the bathroom was super clean and our house keeper even tidied up after my teenage daughter's bits and pieces. Amazing!! Thanks again for a wonderful stay.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: A fantastic hotel seconds away from Times Square! Rooms are decorated beautifully to a high spec! We loved our Coffee maker and bottles of water are provided each day! The staff are friendly, professional and very helpful! Rooms were cleaned daily! Everything was catered for! No hesitation to recommend this hotel! We had a spacious room with two queen beds - suited our family perfectly!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Hyatt Centric just 1 block east of Times Square. In a matter of minutes, you can walk to all of the theatres, Times Square restaurants and attractions, and subway/bus lines. But you would never know it from inside the hotel. On just a couple of occasions did I hear a siren down on the street. Otherwise never even heard other guests while in the room. The room was exceptionally clean and promptly redone each day while we were out exploring. The staff always friendly and we were asked to show a room key each time we entered the hotel and headed towards the elevator bank for guest safety. The spa was delightful. My daughter and I indulged in a reflexology foot and leg massage. After all of the walking, this was a little slice of Ahhhhh!! The restaurant food was good and we had breakfast there on a couple of days. We did not eat at the hotel during other meal times but there was not a lack of guests who did. I will absolutely stay here again if I travel to NYC. The hotel is clean, modern, and quiet.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: If you want a hotel close to Times Square but far enough from the constant noise, look no further than the Hyatt Centric Hotel. The rooms are spacious, comfortable ( and the front desk has chocolate chip cookies to grab on the way up or down!) Service was impeccable. It was wonderful from coming in from the loudness of Time Square to a zen like existence in our hotel room!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I can't say enough good things about this beautiful hotel! We stayed here for 2 nights during our first trip to NYC. We were on floor 52 of 53. Our room was quiet and it stayed pretty dark at night with the curtains shut. The comfortable queen sized beds had nice pillows and a great mattress. It also had a nice thick comforter. The bathroom was very pretty and modern with a rain head shower. There was no fan in the bathroom, so it got steamy. There were only two top drawers for storing clothes, but there was a big closet. We didn't find the refrigerator until the second day. It is hidden and looks like one of the drawers. That is also where the coffee pot and safe are. So, make sure to look behind the things that look like drawers! There was a Keurig and Starbucks coffee in the room.The front desk staff was very friendly and welcoming. They were happy to joke around with us and treated us like we were valued guests. The valet parking was easy and fast, and cost $65/day. The location of the hotel was perfect and within walking distance to most things. Everything was very clean. The hotel itself smells really good. We didn't eat at the rooftop bar but they did let my husband and I (no one under 21 allowed) go out onto the balcony one night. The views were spectacular! The views from the room were pretty cool too. As World of Hyatt members we were able to get an early check-in and a late check-out, which were much appreciated. We would definitely come back to this wonderful hotel in the future!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Picked this hotel because of reviews and location.Both proved correct hotel has very good standards of service and presentation,very clean and rooms in very good decor,bed so comfy and tv has every channel you can think off,sports viewers delight.The location is also excellent as just round the corner from Times Square but not noisy at all,a good base to start your days touring from.Also right next door to a great friendly Irish bar perfect after a long day sightseeing.Stayed here just before Christmas and it is true Happy Holidays.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I caught a great rate for a two night stay. I would stay here again in a minute! The room was very clean (and quiet). The morning breakfast is a good way to start the day. The views from the bar on the top floor were priceless. Can't beat the location.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: On this particular trip to New York, my original intention was to stay for 8 days, but business and a combination of other factors delayed me for some time. After a small mix up with my booking on Expedia, the management personally ensured that the minor inconvenience I experienced was adequately rectified. Furthermore, because I had to extend my stay, they extended me every courtesy imaginable and ensured that I would never stay in another hotel as long as I am in Times Square New York City. Their rooftop bar (where I spent most of my nights) is also fantastic. I have absolutely nothing but praises for this establishment!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Hotel has modern décor. Rooms are a good size for a NYC hotel. Bathroom shower was very large. Floor to ceiling windows in our room which also had a safe and small fridge. No wait for elevators as there is one for floors 1-24 and a separate elevator for floors 25-54. Front desk staff and gentleman at the front entrance were very helpful in providing directions and tips on best mode of transportation depending on where we were going. Very short walk to Times Square including Ellen's Stardust Diner. Kids enjoyed walking to the Hershey and M&M store in Times Square. Also could walk to Bryant Park. Great breakfast spot a few steps away that we stopped at before walking to Empire State Building - also walking distance. Parking is valet and $65 per 24 hour period. They park your car in a nearby garage that charges less. If you research in advance parknsave.com has a few lots nearby for half the price - just be careful if you have an SUV or oversized vehicle as the parking lots will charge an extra $10 to $15/day and then you could be close to the Hyatt's fee of $65. We chose to just use their valet for ease. Would return. Great property in great location.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Hi stayed here for 10 days the front desk staff were rude and unhelpful, the concierge would just turn things back onto to you to do eg booking Broadway tickets etc that is when the person was there and not missing for 30 to 45 minutes with no one knowing where they wereThe bellhop or porters out the front were great and the best source for information We are Gold Hyatt members and NO I would not stay here again!!!!! The beds were lumpy and pillows terrible need to get new mattresses and pillows

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Hotel is in wonderful location steps from Times Square. Beautiful, well-appointed hotel with majestic view. Staff went out of their way to make our trip a great experience. Ask for a tour of the rooftop bar, it's a beautiful view!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Location is just perfect, you are near all the attraction however, not too close. جداً راقي ، لكن ملموم ، وممكن في ناس تنزعج ولكن بالنسبه لي كان اكثر من رائع .انصح بالذهاب الى مكان قريب للفطور شهير بالشيز كيك

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: we wanted a last minute weekend trip to NYC. we booked at the Hyatt Centric and were more than satisfied with everything from the price to the accommodations to the location. it was a last minute treat in NYC

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This place was quite good. It had a great location which was a 2 minute walk if that from the centre of times square. Rooms were clean and tidy and quite comfy and roomy. We were on the 36th floor with an okay view, Mind you the big H&m sign did shine quite bright all night.Breakfast and drinks at the hotel were quite costly but you expect that in NYC. Quality of food and drink was good so happy to pay the price at the end.Overall a good hotel.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I've stayed at the Hyatt Times Square in the past and wouldn't stay any where else. The beds are super comfy and bathrooms are such a great size. Also,the hotel is located perfectly...steps from Times Square, a short walk to Central Park, Empire State Building, Rockefeller Center, several subway stations close by and many of my favorite restaurants!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The front desk manager, Abby, was simply spectacular!!! She made our stay a very special and very memorable one! We will be forever grateful for the memories she helped create! The room was clean and spacious. The location simply perfect! The value cannot be beat!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I would recommend this hotel to my friends and family. The hotel is located in the heart of the city that makes it easy to get to all of the sites in the city. You do not need to have a car in the city because the taxi and subways are close.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Wonderful customer service!!!Alex DeChagas, Director of Operations kept in touch prior to checking in and made sure the reservation was right!Also had some treats in the room for my nieces bday!Lotis was so nice when checking in!Great location in Times Square! Thank you so much!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The fire alarm went off 11:30pm 07/15 and 5:00am 07/16 and woke up my family twice. The announcement on the loudspeaker stated that there was no fire and no need to evacuate. However, I did not rest very peacefully after that night. I called the front desk but no one answered.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The location of the Hyatt Centric is just perfect, half a block from Times Square, the staff are friendly, the room was spacious and has a great bathroom. The breakfast was just the perfect start to the day and has a really super choice.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Super convenient location. The quietest hotel I have stayed in near Times Square. Room and bathroom very spacious and clean. Will look to book here again when travelling to NYC and visiting Times Square area

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Had a great time with my mother at the Hyatt Centric Times Square. Great location.We had a very nice and big room. The hotel is close to everything. Will definitely stay there again next time we are in the city.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Staff gave us a very warm welcome when we arrived. They seem to care about our vacation needs. Location, location, what more can I say..Entertaiment, dining, transportation...This is Hyatt after all!!!!!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Overall the hotel was very good value and "centre ice" to Times Square. Staff were very helpful and professional. (Whomever set off the fire alarms - twice - in the middle of the night though should be....)

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Beautiful hotel, excellent location for access to Times Square, shows, public transport. Easy to get to via bus/subway from LaGuardia. Staff was friendly, professional, personable. The room was immaculate, gorgeous view, very generous with the coffee/tea/bottled water/towels. They allow access to the 54th Floor Bar in the morning before alcohol is served for photos of the sweeping views of Manhattan. Definitely recommend for anybody.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: A very good option for staying 100 yards from Times Square. The rooms were relatively large, and surprisingly enough, one of the windows opened, which was nice staying so high up but parents with kids may want to be careful. The rooftop lounge was another nice touch, juices were well priced. Everything in the room was clean, and the w/c was well lit and spacious.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The Times Square Hyatt Centric is a tranquil haven in the midst of the hectic Times Square environment. The area was vibrant so it was a nice change to go to a room where they have somehow filtered out the noise from below. The roof top restaurant bar is also a nice place to visit. Staff was very friendly and attentive. Very convenient to anything you would want in Midtown including Times Square, Rockerfeller Center, Central Park and everything in between. Two Irish bars on the street for those who are so inclined, both are well stocked. Good for business or holiday and many families were in attendance during my stay.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Good hotel being in the Times Square puts you in easy walking distance of many major attractions. Madam Tussauds, The Rock and Grand Central Station to name a few. Easy access to Big Bus tickets and bus stops. Subway right on Times Square.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We continue to come back to this hotel. It is always a pleasure. The hospitality of the staff, is always warming. The location is perfect. You are in walking distance of many of shows and great dining.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Returned to see what this new Hyatt Centric Times Square was all about. I was happy to see the staff and accommodations were all as great as they were on my previous visits.This is certainly a great hotel with a fantastic location. Just a block off of Times Square and a couple doors away from the best Irish Pub in Manhattan, Connolly’s.I highly suggest that if you're going to visit NYC to not only book the Hyatt Centric at Times Square, but also upgrade yourself to a high floor with the view. It's worth it! Their rooftop bar, Bar 54, has some of the best views of Times Square and Manhattan. Unlike a lot of hotel rooftop bars, the Hyatt gives preference to hotel guests. Non-guests have to sign in downstairs and gain entry with a special card. Although I recommend making a reservation, as a guest, you can just go up from your floor and will be given a table. I would suggest finding out what time the sun will set while you're there and make your way up about 30/40 minutes before. The photo op is worth it.I didn't have a chance to eat at their ground floor restaurant, but it has always been good in the past.The beds are very comfortable and having a small refrigerator in the room, especially in NYC, is a great feature. One other highlight about the room, the powerful water pressure in the shower. I’ve stayed at hotels in NY where the water comes out like a mist. Thanks, Hyatt Centric for another great stay. I'm looking forward to returning in September for my birthday, have the cake and candles ready.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Times Square and Broadway around the corner. Fifth Avenue, Rockerfella Centre and Central Park all in walking distance. The staff here are wonderful. Nothing is too much trouble. We had a lovely view of Times Square from our terrace. The lift is super fast. We went from the lobby to the roof top bar in seconds! My ears popped every time lolRooms are clean and comfortable. Ice on every floor and a fridge to store drinks and snacks. Robes and slippers are available. but you have to request them. Large comfy bed with quality bed linen. Complimentary Starbucks coffee pods and water. The first night the fire alarm went off three times and a voice boomed out saying there was an issue that they were investigating. I would have liked an 'all clear' message. At least we weren't evacuated in the early hours

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Would love to recommend this lovely hotel to anyone traveling to NY. I was here on work and had very comfortable stay. Centrally located at Times Square this gives you good access to places to eat drink and unwind after work.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great location, very comfortable room (good size) and bathroom, very friendly and helpful staff (from front desk, to housekeeping, to doormen) and reasonably priced for NYC. Roof top terrace a must see. Would definitely return.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Right on the center of Times Square without the noise. Smaller hotel, but room was a good size for the 3 of us. The hotel is relatively new, with minimalist feel. Service was great, close to 42 and 47 street subway stations.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Firstly the good - this hotel is right off time square so great location (I imagine this to be the main reason the ratings are so high) The rooftop bar is also great, cocktails are pricey ($26!) but the view is worth it for a quick one before you head out. The bad - Hotel asked for a $250 'security' deposit on arrival, even when you pay cash in full. I wasn't made aware of this so it was a nasty surprise having to leave that much cash with the hotel for no reason. (It might be policy in NYC but it needs to be highlighted beforehand if you ask me!) - I checked in slightly before my boyfriend and he was stopped from entering the hotel even though he obviously knew our room number and had a suitcase with him. I had to actually come all the way down to the lobby to come and get him. Staff could have at the very least called up to my room and confirm that way rather than treat him like some kind of criminal. Hotel asks to see room keys every time you enter, would understand if you were in an all inclusive resort with facilities people could take advantage of......but here it's just irritating!!!!- Restaurant does not cater well for vegetarians, pasta was mediocre and served on a strange blue plate you might find at the back of your grandmas cupboard. It was quiet on a Saturday night. Eat somewhere else. Probably stay somewhere else too, plenty of other hotels In the same area I could of picked but the rooftop bar enticed me to this one.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I have stayed in NYC many times and rate this hotel the best out of them all. The hotel was incredibly clean. Staff were kind, welcoming and very professional. It was one of those places that felt right from curb to check out. I had a young family and not once did I feel that the staff were put out. The location couldn't be better. Not a hotel to pass up!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This was by far my best hotel staff ever. The hotel staff went above and beyond to make my family's trip to NY amazing. This was particularly important to me as this was my two boys first trip to NY. I can say for sure this is a trip they will never forget.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I wanted to give some feedback about my experience this past weekend with the Hyatt Centric Times Square. My wife and I booked this trip in January and were just coming to go to dinner and see a show. I booked a King room with city view as we wanted to experience the view. We arrived at 12pm and checked in; understanding our check in was 4pm. I had our luggage stored while we went for lunch and did some shopping. He front desk staff said they would call when our room was ready. We stopped back in3 separate times but was told it would be ready at 4pm. I then checked with the staff at 3:55pm to see if it was ready, it was not and they said they had an issue with housekeeping and that our room was not going to be ready and really did not know when it would be ready. I let the staff know that I had a dinner reservation for 5:30pm and tickets for a show at 8pm, I let them know I was celebrating my wife's 40th birthday. The staff said they could get us into another room but it was not a room with the view I paid for. I expressed my displeasure and they offered my wife and me the option of getting a shower in the spa. That was unacceptable with me as I paid for a room with a check in at 4pm. I asked to speak with a manager and the manager came out and apologized offering the same options as the front desk staff, she let me know that the linen delivery did not come at 4:30am but came at 2pm and that was the issue. My response to her was I understand the issue but it was not my issue as a paying customer, I did not receive what I paid for. I had met the hotel Operation Manager while sitting at the bar at 2:30pm and he let me know if I needed anything to let him know. He walked by after my discussion with the manager. I informed him of the situation and he said he would see what he could do. 4:20pm now and I was visibly upset with the situation as many other customers now being told the same thing we were being told. I asked him why no one told us this issues the 3 previous attempts to check-in. I let him know I am a Hospital Administrator, staffing and operation issues are not customer's problems, he agreed and said the only thing they could do is put us in another room without the view that I paid for. Not wanting to miss the dinner I had set up for my wife's birthday and making her feel any worse I agreed to the other room. (Disappointing view) The operation manager did offer to cover any drinks or restaurant charges for us which were a nice gestures. Let's fast forward to 12:00am, my wife and I were at the Sky lounge after our show to see the view that I had paid for and a fire alarm went off. The staff said do not worry this happens all the time, as a family who recently went through a house fire and lost everything, we were very worried about being on the 54th floor with a possible fire. We went to our room to get a few things so we could start heading down the stairs. At 1:15am the FSD cleared the alarm, appears a cigarette in stairwell caused the alarm. We went back to the room and went to bed around 2am and were woken up again at 4:30am to another fire alarm. We went downstairs again in case there was a fire and when we arrived, the lobby was full of panicked guests and children crying. The staff member who greeted us said go back to your rooms, there is nothing wrong just alarm and Fire Department is investigating the alarm. This staff member was so rude to guests and had no empathy for anyone. FYI, the FSD never gave an all clear as the fire annunciator malfunctioned causing my wife and I to not get any sleep. After this evening of terror my wife and I decided to take the offer given by the Operation Manager to cover any cost in the restaurant and have breakfast before checking out. I stopped at the front desk to let them know of the offer from the Operation Manager and find out how we needed to get that covered. The man said just charge to your room and we will take care of the charge. My wife and I had breakfast, charged to the room and then we checked out at 11:30am not wanting to stay till our 3pm late check out. When I arrived home last evening I checked my bill that was sent and my breakfast charge was charged to my credit card. My Hyatt experience has been the worst hotel and customer service experience of my entire life! Of all staff members we interacted with only one smiled and was polite, that was a man outside at 5:20pm on Saturday who was kind enough to help us get a cab to go to dinner. I hope this feedback helps you improve on these inadequacies of customer service so your brand may be able to recover with others for a multitude of missed opportunities.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great location. Staff was excellent. Nice touches for my birthday. Roof top bar is a must. My wife loved the heated bathroom floor, especially since I had the room at a low temperature. Very comfy bed. Mini fridge, coffee..water

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The location of the hotel is great. It takes just 1 minute to get times square by foot.People were kind and friendly. We stayed at 37th floor. The view was good and we went up to a bar located at 54th floor. We really enjoyed our stay at the hotel.I missed presenting my frequent flyer number to get a mileage when I checked in. after I got back home I sent an email, and thanks to the manager, I could get a response from the manager that my frequent flyer number was reflected in my account.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Enjoyed this small Hyatt hotel located just off of Times Square. We were able to walk to both of our broadway shows with ease. The checkin staff, restaurant/downstairs bar, maid service bellmen staff were all awesome! They paid attention to all of the details and I felt very safe here. The bed was VERY comfortable but the pillows were flat with zero support. The rooftop bar staff on two occasions didn't acknowledge me... so I ended up joining the bar downstairs.. and they appreciated my business. Apparently they have an over-sensitive fire alarm that went off TWICE on my last night (Midnight and 4:30 am). Fortunately, it was not a fire, but we had to evacuate twice.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Recently stayed at the hyatt centric times square,very good position for times square,the rooms very comfortable and the staff very good,good in room facilities eg coffee machine,bottles of water,good house keeping maids,just a note of caution to travellers away from hotel beware of the tipping requirements they can be intimidating in some establishments and sometimes rude to custommers,one barman in olunneys bar next to hotel was very ignorent when i refused to tip him,otherwise enjoyed experience,

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great location for walking to shop, eat, theatre! Everyone was very friendly. They give you free water at the front desk. Variety of pillows to choose from. Umbrellas if it's raining! Definitely stay there again.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The location was perfect for walking to site and attending shows.The gentleman outside was very polite and welcoming but the woman at the desk was not at all. This was a gift and special instructions were given for us to have early check in and a great view. Room was not ready and was told they could downgrade me. NO THANKS. View was on back side of building so was not fabulous. Had to ask for clean towels the next day as room was not cleaned when we returned in evening. Expected more glam but room was lovely and clean when we arrived. If front staff had been polite would have felt totally different about stay there.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great hotel and location. Small and peaceful in a crazy part of NYC. I loved the rooms which were not small on New York standards and also how the beds were super comfortable. Also the roof bar with outside deck rocked!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Stayed here for one night on Independence Day. Lovely quiet room and very comfortable bed. Excellent location right in the centre of it all. Staff at reception helpful and the 54th floor a must for a drink. Just one of course as it's not cheap, but what a view.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This is the second time we used the Hyatt Centric in NYC and we have been pleased with both visits. Great location, very nice rooms, great staff - very friendly and helpful. Would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to family or friends

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We are always happy to come here for our NYC experience .. this is what a hotel should be in NYC.. clean rooms and great staff .. rest assured you are special here !! I cannot stress though rooms in NYC are not known to be huge so if you have big families I can't speak for giant amounts of luggage if that's what you need etc but our family of four does well here.. we will always come back here!!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Lovely hotel ideal location was only in New York only 3 nights so location was perfect. Conceige greeted us when we walked in very polite and professional. Went to room straight away. Room had coffee machine and bottles of water as and when we required. Fridge in room big plus. Only downside my husband asked for a special welcome if possible as celebrating my 40th it took them 2 days and two visits from my husband for them to put a small cake (was lovely) and a lovely bottle in room, only to be told on leaving we had to pay for it (the cheek) we were shocked to the core. The matter was quickly resolved but leaves a bit of a sour taste after a lovely experience in New York.
user_location: The Royal Town of Sutton Coldfield, United Kingdom

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Wife wanted to stay at really nice hotel in ny. I booked this hotel based on reviews. Room was nice and clean. Front desk at check in and restaurant staff seemed not wanting to work or snobbish. The maid, bellman, and check out clerk were nicest.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I stayed at the Hyatt Centric for one night. We had tickets to The Lion King which was a stone's throw away. The hotel itself is just around the corner from the Times Square we all see on TV. I chose this hotel because it was close to the Minskoff Theatre but didn't realise how close it was to Times Square. It proved convenient because we could sight see and walk up and down Times Square and return to the hotel in a few minutes. The broadway show Aladdin is also nearby. Our view wasn't great. Just boring buildings but that wasn't why I chose the hotel. The staff are friendly and we liked our room. It was clean and modern. They offered so many freebies. The bathroom floor was heated. I ordered buttermilk pancakes and a veggie omelet and everyone thought the food was delicious. it was delivered promptly and was hot. They also offered umbrellas which came in handy. The umbrellas were in a bin in the lobby so you could pick one up as needed. We also needed a few things and those things were delivered promptly. The room had an iron and ironing board, a coffee maker, and free water as well. Since we were only there for one night, we were unable to take advantage of all of the amenities. I peeked at the gym and it looked great. We didn't have a chance to see everything else but you can't beat the location. would've loved to see the rooftop bar but we didn't have enough time. I would stay there again.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Wi-Fi available which makes more happiness to your stay while you are at the hotel .. I would recommend more flixbaiity on the check out time to give the family like a sort of chance to stay at least till 2 pm instead of 12 sharp however everything was perfect and outstanding
user_location: Emirate of Dubai, United Arab Emirates

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Perfect location, comfortable hotel for a family of 4. Views from roof top bar are amazing Attached restaurant very expensive, recommend not eating there and the check in staff we had were not friendly.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Excellent customer service. Front desk, concierge, maid service, and director were fantastic. The room needed new carpet. The numerous power outlets and USB charger were useful. The daily bottled water came in very handy when walking in the city. Bed was comfortable. The rooftop bar was beautiful, but very expensive (not surprising). It would be nice to be open for lunch/breakfast/dinner food service. I had told the kids that the hotel had a rooftop restaurant where we could have breakfast, but I was wrong.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The accommodations are quite large for New York. Very comfortable and newly decorated. The staff are most helpful and accommodating. It's a great location. 1 block from Times Square, beautiful roof top bar with a spectacular view. Casual dining as well as up scale dining are just steps away. Easy access to the subway. Took our family and everyone enjoyed out stay at this lovely hotel.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Located on West 45 just a bit off B'way/7th Avenue, it is a quick walk to most places in the theatre district--avoiding the crowds in Times Square is recommended. The hotel is half the price of the Marriott Marquis (although itself a nice hotel) and has a great roof deck bar/appetizers on the 54th floor. Nice view. Staff, housekeeping friendly and personable. Checkin/out was fast and easy. I was given a welcoming email by the manager of the hotel before my arrival and his personal contact information if I needed his assistance, an online checkin tool, and a chance to fill out a survey after my staff. The room was clean, beds very comfortable, bathroom clean and nice plush towels. I did not try room service, but they do have an attached restaurant/bar through their lobby. Lots of food choices in the area, along with bodega very close, should you want to buy sodas or water for your room. Each room has a safe, refrigerator, coffee, etc. Big windows in the room, Nicely thought out lighting and free internet. I would very much go back and recommend it to others. I've been a World of Hyatt member for sometime, so have been impressed with their hotels for a long time. This one, and this my first stay here, did not disappoint. Good value for the money slightly off of times square. Easy access to cabs, Uber/Lyft's, busses and any shuttle services to the airports in the area.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We had an amazing family vacation in New York. Spacious room, GREAT location and thanks to Walter (valet) for chatting with us every day, making recommendations on places to go, see and eat and making our overall experience truly exceptional. The Hyatt Centric has a gem in you!! Would definitely go back again.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Chose the Hyatt after doing considerable research for this area, turned out to be Very good value for Times Square, Clean and Good Size Suites, Rooms, competition nearby offers 200 ft and 130 ft, on the main street rates are double. The room service and housekeeping were efficient

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We recently returned from a 5-day trip to NYC. We had a very enjoyable stay at the Hyatt Centric Times Square. Before we arrived, I had worked with Alex, their Director of Operations, to straighten out some issues with our reservations, and he made sure everything was perfect, even upgrading our room to a Deluxe View King on the 52nd floor to help compensate for the reservation problem. The room was awesome--modern, clean, and quite large for the Times Square area, with a great view, including One World Trade building. We also enjoyed several meals in T45, the hotel restaurant--the food was good, the wait staff handled our special requests happily and accurately, and we even got a great sightseeing tip from our waiter that we used that same day! Checkin and checkout could not have been easier, and again the staff was friendly and efficient. I can't even complain about the elevators--they zipped up and down so fast to our 52nd floor that it made our ears pop! And you can't beat the location--just a block from Times Square. The only issue we had the whole time was very slow service in the "rooftop" bar (not really rooftop--more roofedge!), but I know that was only because it was a very busy Friday night. I would definitely stay at this Hyatt Centric again and would recommend it to friends.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We came for 1 night and stayed for 3! Staff was amazing! Location was killer! Hotel was clean and modern. The hotel is 1 block away from the heart of Time Square! The price was great too! Whatever you need, it's there or within a block! You will enjoy every part of your stay!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I don't know much about that your city, this was the first time I had ever been there. The couple that we were going with had lived there years ago. So it was nice being there with someone who knew the city I highly recommend if you do go go with somebody who knows their way around. The hotel is absolutely wonderful in every aspect. The only thing that I would say to another traveler is the city can be overwhelming so make sure you know where you're going. But as far as this hotel I don't think you can get much better.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: good service, locations and connections & Link to all important places, very clean, and comfortable to stay. food is average and its very costly. there is no bathtab only shower, but its ok , the locations is absalutely fine.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great hote. Graet location. Grear service. Highly reccomended. Do not hesitate and book...wonderful expirience for my wife and for me. We will come again shortly. We had firect connection to the director of operation !!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The Hyatt Centric team make your stay over your expectation. Our personal experience, we couldn't ask more then being on the highest floor, the professionalist and courtoisy of the valets and the check-in and check-out by DeDe a delight. Again, thank you and hope to see the team back soon !

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This hotel has the perfect location when visiting NYC (for the first time). Located 1 minute from Times Square and with easy access to absolutely everything. Nice and and spacious rooms and a great rooftop bar which is expensive, but hey, everything in New York is. :)

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The Centric Hyatt Hotel is located in a perfect location near Time Square in Manhattan. Further its close to Rockefeller Center, Radio City Music Hall, Central Park, a variety of comedy clubs, museums, water activities, and more. Staff were attentive, helpful, friendly, and informative.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This hotel is literally in the center of Times Square! The room I stayed in was on the 10th floor and it was quiet! I also like that this hotel provides complimentary bottled water. The only thing that I didn't like was the broken make-up mirror and was told it would be fixed that day. It was never fixed. I also liked that they provided umbrellas for guests who needs to use them!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This is the second time staying at same hotel . Great experience -talk about service location staff all are amazing . Must goo to rooftop bar .love the location of the place . Everything is walking distance . Staff is really very cooperative . Rooms are really big and look new.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Staff went above and beyond to make our stay enjoyable. The whole team was excellent, genuine, and truly customer focused. While I didn't appreciate the dirty carpet, this is minor compared to the great and personalized service we received! I received emails prior to arrival and not the typical computer generated email, this was an email specific to my party. Alex and his team tried to fulfill everything we requested and they met those expectations and so much more. I wrote in advance about a super early check in because of my husband's birthday and his elderly mother traveling with us. I was asking for the early check-in as his mom would not be able to keep constantly moving in NYC. Low and behold, the Hyatt TS team had a beautiful bouquet of balloons for my husband upon arrival in our second room. No charge, just being nice, we really appreciated the gesture and hadn't expected it. Not to mention, that our early check in request was honored for one of the rooms so Mom could rest as needed. All of the staff were very cordial and accommodating. The night before we stayed at the Hilton Conrad NYC which is a 5 star hotel and it was nice. We stayed there to see downtown NYC without all of the traveling with Mom. However, I can tell you that in the future we will only stay with Hyatt Centric TS while in NYC. The Customer Service at Hyatt Centric out beats the competition and that means the most to my family. Thank you so much Hyatt Centric Times Square Staff!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Staying at this hotel was simply awesome experience! This place is at a great location and the staff and management so efficient. Its a few steps from the centre of all the attractions. It's in the heart of Times Square so it's walking distance to all midtown sites & Central Park.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great & convenient NYC theater district location. Wonderful staff. Well appointed, comfortable, and quiet rooms; excellent bedding. Convenient to many subways, but not convenient if personal auto or cabs are used because of traffic situation.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: My two youngest brothers just recently moved to NY, my friend and I visit them. It was first but I can guarantee not a last when I going to staying at Hyatt Historic Time Square. The roof-top bar on 54th floor are awesome place to be at evening and there are so many people you can meet.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Such a wonderful experience! Entering this CLEAN establishment was impressing. The decor modern and trendy! Colorful! Fun! We had a high view room two queens. Perfect for our family of four here to check out nyc! We can't say enough about how GREAT the staff and customer service is here! Smiling happy people who have a wealth of knowledge from good restaurants, to local liquor and spirits to hailing a flat rate taxi! They have trained their staff above and beyond in every area! Doormen checking room keys to make sure you belong at the hotel..bonus as it is a city full of people wandering in all directions day and night! We also LOVE cranberry cafe..a few doors down...for small stuff...coffe e snacks for the kids etc! So cheap too! I can't say enough about our happiness with Hyatt while we were in nyc July 2017! If we return we wouldn't love else where if time square is yiur destination as it's right there:) but far enough away that your not trampled on out the front door!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This place is in great location and the staff and management are so efficient!! They were able to accommodate us with a private driver! Took into consideration my husbands medical condition and were so nice. The B54 rooftop bar is amazing.. the views are great and the I loved the menu with all the quotes!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We stayed at this Hyatt for five days just before July 4th and enjoyed our stay. You cannot beat its location. It is a block from the TKTS booth where we bought show tickets to three wonderful shows, all within walking distance of the hotel. The subway entrance was a couple of blocks away.The rooftop bar (B-54) was wonderful for a bird's eye view of the city. We got amazing night time pictures from up there. Highly recommended.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Excellent location - few steps from the center of all the action (Attractions, theaters,…etc.). In midtown, so you can get to downtown, uptown, or central park very easily. Great Staff: I mentioned to the manager that my visit was to celebrate my daughter's 15th birthday. When we arrived to the room, we found balloons and birthday wish card waiting for my daughter. This was an amazing gesture and my daughter loved it. Great Service: They provided great advice on where to go for good food, where to watch the 4th of July fireworks and they were always nice and courteous. The Manager, Alex DeChagas, contacted me personally few days before arriving asking if I needed any help preparing for my trip. You do not get this kind of service anywhere and this showed me the dedication this Hyatt has for their customers. I would recommend anyone going to New York City to stay at the Hyatt Centric. I will always be staying there any time I am in New York City Thanks everyone from the Manager to the staff

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I spent two nights here using a points and cash rate. The rooms were interestingly decorated and more fun than your standard room. Beds were comfortable, shower was huge and I enjoyed the rain shower head. Everything was new and clean which was great. We didn't eat or drink at the rooftop bar but they did allow us to go out and look at the view which was pretty incredible. The hotel is less than a block from Times Square which provided a convenient location for seeing a Broadway show and also for walking around the area to see the sights.As a discoverist member, I had late check out at 2 pm and the front desk kindly held my bags as I went out after this. Overall great hotel, would recommend for those who want to be in the center of the attractions!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Perfection at all levels from staff to hospitality. Great location , food and service. From the second you check in till the check out time, you feel home, safe, family environment. It is a must and best hotel in times square. Tried many but this by far the best

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: If you have to stay in Manhattan, which is a bad idea, because it's noisy and dirty area, the Hyatt is a good choice. It's a modern and well managed hotel. Close to many "must see" places, such as Time square and Central Park and others, and no need to use ugly New York metro…

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Best Hyatt hotel I have ever stayed! Super nice staff and respond our request very fast. Food is good, and very convenient location where is the in the heart of New York time square. We don't need to drive at all.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: My wife and I enjoyed a great stay at the Hyatt. Eva and the staff provided a wonderful trip to New York City. Thanks again for making our Anniversary special for both of us to remember along time. We will see you soon.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Upon first entering the Hyatt Centric Times Square it is quite underwhelming, as the lobby is quite small and minimalistic, but this is the only underwhelming thing about this hotel!!! We booked a Deluxe View King which was amazing! We were in room 4902 which gave un-obstructed views all the way down to the Freedom Tower. The room itself was a great size, especially in New York, with a huge very comfortable bed, a modern tub chair, coffee table, a writing desk and chair. The hotel also provided bottled water, and a Keurig Coffee machine, with Starbucks coffee, all of which were replenished daily. The bathroom was a good size, with the sink and vanity separated from the rainfall shower and bath tub, by a full glass wall and door. The toiletries were supplied by the on site Marilyn Monroe Spa, and were a lovely addition. Besides the room and the great views, what makes this hotel very special is the great staff. Upon originally checking into our room there was a problem with the AC, which I reported to the front desk. The lady I spoke with apologised profusely, and said she would have someone from maintenance look at it immediately. We left the room for a couple of hours, and upon our return the AC was working perfectly. We also received a knock on the door from Brian the maintenance man to check that everything was ok, and to give us a note and a chocolate hammer, a really nice gesture I thought. I also received several emails from Alex DeChagas, director of operations throughout our stay, to ensure we were enjoying our time, which I'm not sure if it is just for World of Hyatt members, but definitely shows that the excellent customer service is led from the top. The other great feature of this hotel is the roof top bar, which has an outside terrace with fantastic views over the city. The drinks are a bit expensive, but it is New York!All in all, I cannot recommend the Hyatt Centric Times Square enough, it has a great location, brilliant rooms with amazing views, fantastic staff and it even smells nice, don't book any other hotel in New York!!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Understand my 4 star review is still excellent. 5 stars are reserved for the best hotels with the best amenities (Four Seasons, Mandarin Oriental, etc.).For the price this was an excellent experience. In Manhattan this was dirt cheap for what it provided (considering that some hotels run $2000.00 per night, my daily rate of $315.00 was very inexpensive for the quality of the property and staff).We were in an exec suite (about 600 sq. ft with a separate bedroom and sofa bed). Tasteful modern decor. Nice bathroom with big shower (rain shower, no less). I am very hard to please on bed comfort but I believe most people would find the bed pretty comfy. Sofa bed is a sofa bed but it was more than adequate for the kids. Room was in very good repair as was the entire property. Housekeeping was excellent in the room and throughout the property. Considering this is NY city and we were right near the elevator, noise level was quite tolerable and I am sensitive to noise. Also be aware the hotel was packed as we stayed July 4 weekend so the service comments take on additional meaning.There is a spa but we did not use it. No pool for the kids :-(.Location is about 1 block from all of the action so there are A LOT of people around.Dining from room service and the restaurant was solid. Not top of the line food, but not bad. Very accommodating and allergy sensitive.Overall the single best quality of this property is the staff. All friendly, all helpful and requests are addressed very promptly. Considering it was a very busy weekend that was all the more impressive.If I were to want to come to see a show or be located near Times Square I would definitely consider staying at the Hyatt Centric Times Square without hesitation.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This hotel could not have been better. Everyone from front desk to house keeping genuinely loved their job of making your stay great, no one more than Paula Cano. Location is excellent, roof top bar amazing view, select a room with a view when booking. Your kids will love the mac and cheese. You'll love the rosè.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great property, great location & staff. Rooms are much larger than your typical NYC room. Spotless & newly updated. It's in the heart of Times Square so it's walking distance to all midtown sites & Central Park. Make sure to check out the great roof top bar!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The staff is very friendly but weren't able to get us into our room for early check-in. They said they'd text as soon as they could get us in. No text... It was a bit after 4 that we went back on our own and stood in front of them until they found us a room.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I was very impressed when we walked in. The staff at the front desk was extremely polite and helpful. The elevators are super modern and Hi-Teck. The room we stayed (Sweet #4804) was clean and very comfortable with big bathroom with great and modern interior design and had everything we needed. The view! It was AMAZING. 48th flor….. Times Square…. Unbelievable….. Unforgettable!!!!!THE BED!...was like sleeping on a marshmallow. Relaxing haven in the middle of busy New York City. Again, the service at the front desk was excellent. Great service is their trademark! Would like to highlight front desk agent Steven Hoyos who did very professional job. Dealing with him during our stay was a pleasure. Just because of him we already have booked our next stay over there. We loved this hotel and will definitely stay here again.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Perfect location. Staff could not have been nicer or more accommodating. Rooms were decent size, nicely laid out and very clean. Elevators split so there were express to top half of hotel. Very quick. Great view from our window of Times Square.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Staff was friendly enough. Our room wasn't ready when we arrived,but we didn't expect it to be as it was fairly early. We left our bags and explored the city. Came in that night to a clean, quiet room in Times Square. Will stay again!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Stayed on the top floor and it was worth every penny. Great views of Time Square and it was close to everything. Very comfortable room and staff is nice. Room service was quick and the food was amazing. Didn't get to check out the skyjack but it looked super nice. Would love to come back again!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Place was really nice and staff was fun. Rooms were pretty good with plenty of room. Checkout was easy with a fun girl. We burned it down in the bar and they were still fun. Stay here if you want to be centrally located.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The rooms were nice and clean. Close to Times Square and Broadway, There are restaurant onsite and nearby. Would prefer better security as anyone can access the floors. Close to shopping and business areas, very busy day & night. .

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The Hyatt Centric Times Square is always our hotel of choice when visiting NYC. The management is superb and the team members provide a high level of customer services. The folks who work outside, the front desk, and room service are all top notch. It's always a pleasure to stay at this property. We especially enjoy the terrace which there aren't very many hotels in NYC that provide this awesome accommodation.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Excellent!!! Service was excellent, Very clean rooms, bathrooms, lobby area, elevators, restaurants. Comfortable beds, sheets and covers. The hotel has a very good smell/fragrance throughout the entire building. The location is excellent because it's in the heart of everything -Times square, Rockefeller Plaza, Broadway etc. And the staff was great! Overall experience was excellent!!!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: From the cookie on arrival, to the friendly service staff, we really liked Hyatt Centric. The room was beautiful and clean, and every staff member we came across was polite and friendly. The personal note of congratulations that was left in our room as a keepsake and the small gift was a beautiful gesture! Thank you!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I have spent couple of weeks reviewing different hotels in NYC that could be suitable for a family, clean and close to the top attractions and I don't I could have chosen a better one than Hyatt Centric. It's literally few steps from the heart of Times Square which an ideal location if you are a first timer in NYC. The room is clean with large and very comfy beds. Although my two kids could be little messy the cleaning service turned the room just like new when ever we came back.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Have stayed here last summer and just recently. (2016 & 2017). Was treated exceptionally on both occasions. Location could not be better. 1/2 block from Times Square. Within walking distance of many attractions. 2-3 blocks from nearest subway station. Accommodations include storing luggage if arrival is before check in. Also store luggage if leaving on a later flight. Was granted extended check out time born occasions. Great rates for a great location. Room amenities outstanding. Will be back. My location for NYC adventures.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: My wife and I stayed here for four days while I attended seminars for continuing legal education credit at the PLI Center which is virtually next door, so this hotel is incredibly convenient for that purpose. The staff were uniformly pleasant and helpful. We had a deluxe king room; these rooms are on higher floors with lovely views facing south, from the Chrysler building to the east, to the Freedom tower directly south, to TImes Square below and to the west. The lights at night were wonderful to watch. I highly recommend the higher floors because though Times Square and NYC in general are LOUD, this room on the 42nd floor was very quiet. The room was good sized for NYC and spotlessly clean. The king bed was very comfortable. Furnishings are just OK. The gym was very nice and very well equiped, and literally empty when I used it. The restaurant downstairs was quite good and we enjoyed a meal at an outdoor table. Good breakfast/lunch options include Cranberries Cafe (to go only) just a few doors east and Europa Cafe (to go or sit down) just around the corner between 45th and 46th on 6th Ave.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This place is really accommodating for your stay. Make use of all the amenities they have to offer! We made a reservation at Bar 54 and it was really special for an anniversary. These people are really great!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We had a great time in NY and the Hyatt Centric was top notch! Great room, great staff, great location! We paid a bit extra and got an awesome view of Times Square! Totally worth the money for the kids to see times square day and night. We will be back!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Well, U may be wondering if everything is so good then why the rating is 4 out of 5? Will tell U in a while but first the good thing1. Exactly 40 secs from Times Square. It is as close as it can be. 2. After about a 24 hours flight we reached hotel at around noon. The rooms were to be given at around 4.00pm. But guess what - the excellent front desk staff allotted our rooms. Such a nice gesture 3. We booked a room for 3 with 2 queen beds. The room is quite spacious considering Manhattan standards & clean too. No complaints from that quarterNow the area for improvements 1. The house keeping staffs are quite forgetful. Did not replenish the coffee paraphernalia. Had a harrowing morning boot up2. After spending more 450 USD per night U will expect Bathrobes & bathroom slippers in the room. But not in this propertyOtherwise it is good stay

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: There are countless hotels in Manhattan, so it's not always easy to decide where to stay. I'm very glad I decided to earn World of Hyatt loyalty points by choosing the Hyatt Centric Times Square. I treated myself to an upgraded room, and was dazzled when I found myself on the 50th floor, looking south all the way to the new Freedom Tower. Floor to ceiling windows, sleek but comfortable furniture and decor, an especially nice bathroom, plenty of drawers and an in-room safe made the room terrific. The rooftop Bar 54 has even better views. The hotel is just off Times Square and near the Broadway theaters. Staff is consistently pleasant and helpful. I hope to stay there again!

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I had booked a view room and received upgrade offer to a View Suite for additional $35 per night, it was worth the price. Room 5101. Nice bathtub, comfortable bed, and nice views. 1/2 block from Times Square on 45th.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Was very satisfied with our hotel selection, very clean and relaxing room. Near the Time Square was very convenient to walk, take the tour bus or Uber. Had some snacks and d inks at the B54 Roof top; nice view. The main restaurant had an owsome dessert called Tres Leche that was out of this world, would recommend it to everyone.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The Hyatt Centric is the place to stay for a pleasant vacation. It is very close to what we were there for, Broadway shows. All the theaters are within a very quick and easy walk with eating places all around.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: A good place to know near Times Square / Central Park. Very well located : near everything (market, supplies, metro, central park..). A roof top well suited, 54 floor !!! Congratulations to the staff and level of service they procure. A place to remember without any doubt

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: We lucked out, grabbing a room for the nite at a fabulous price. Checkin was quick and easy. The girl at the front desk was very friendly when we arrived at 11 pm. We were offered bottled water. The two 'guards' stationed by the elevator gave some false sense of security as they verified all had a room key to proceed. I wonder how closely they check the key was issued by the hotel. The room was not large but not small either. The AC was on which felt nice as we walked into the room. The bathroom had heated tile floors! The one negative was the carpeting which was quite stained in many spots making the room feel dirty when it was very clean minus the rug. Definitely a place I would stay again. Just couldn't give it a 5 because of the stained carpet.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I requested a particular type of room from the manager in advance and he came though big time for me. The property is in a perfect location for the theatre and is centrally located for everything else. We lived our stay.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Spent a lovely weekend in New York City at the Hyatt Centric Times Square. We had a lovely room on the 16th floor. Very quiet and tucked away from the noise of Times Square. Hotel has a roof top patio which boasts wonderful views but is quiet small and very hard to gain access to. There is a restaurant just off the check- in desk with an outdoor patio which was also difficult to get a table at. In room amenities were from the Spa and were outstanding.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Walking distance to great places, security on alert!!! Everyone helpful with needs of transportation. Had great driver to Westbury, check in easy and felt welcomed upon arrival. Bathroom was spacious, well supplied, coffee yummy.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Our stay was fantastic from beginning to end. Upon arrival, following a very challenging, frustrating and exhausting trip to the hotel, we were spent. The entire staff was fantastic and helped us settle in quickly and directed us to food close by. Ms. Dede in particular was wonderful. From then on, everything was terrific. The room was clean and tranquil. It was remarkably quiet considering how close it was to Times Square. Would absolutely stay there again and would recommend it highly without reservation.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: I am in Times Square hotels several times a year and this is my new favorite. Great location steps off Broadway. Excellent customer service. Nice rooms at a good price. Didn't make it to the rooftop (bad weather) but heard it's amazing.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: loved the hotel and location. They do check your key coming in which adds to the security. The rooftop bar has a great view. the staff is very warm and friendly. This is on our list of places to stay in New York City

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This is a well run, staffed and appointed hotel. The location could not be better and feels like a boutique property. Great value. This a terrific place for business, tourist and sightseeing. A block off Times Square make it convenient yet quiet.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Excellent value . Clean . Friendly staff. Great location . Drinks on the rooftop were pricey but commensurate amy rooftop bar . Made reservations through Hotel Tonight and upgraded for a small fee once I was at the hotel .

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: This was my best ever experience at Hyatt, I used to be in Hyatt house for extended stay where hotel is more like home with full furnished. Hyatt centric was more of a luxury stay and I loved each bit of my stay there. staff was very friendly and food lounge was very good, California cheesy omelets was my favorite there along with strawberry banana smoothie....... Although I am globalist but I don't think they treat people based on what tier of rewards customer is love to go again there....

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Exceptional service and very nice hotel. We left a poor experience @ TRYP by Wyndham, Times Square behind and moved to Hyatt Centric. So happy we did! Mike at the front desk did everything possible to make our stay comfortable. Every staff member we encountered was polite and professional - unlike the TRYP hotel.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great location, close to Times Square. Modern, clean rooms with a good restaurant next door if you don't feel like venturing far. We paid for a high room which had a kind-of view of one of the billboards in Times Square which probably wasn't worth it but overall we enjoyed our stay.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Hotel is very clean , rooms very modern, View is incredible from the room and rooftop bar, location is perfect, staff is friendly and knowledgeable, greeted me by my last name. Pina colada in lobby bar is to die for .

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: The Hyatt Centric is an oasis of calm in NY. Great location so close to Times Square and Broadway shows, but completely quiet and private when in the room. Elevators very quick and fabulous views. Restaurant next to main checkin area is flexible and has very good food. Overall a great place to stay.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Great location 100yds off Times Square, typical Hyatt rooms, NYC rooms are normally small, this isn't that bad, nice bathroom. Bar54 a great hang out and view surprisingly on 54th floor:-). Valet parking ($65 per night..ouch) , modern bar downstairs as well. Good choice.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Had a good stay here. The property is well placed right where it should be. Lots to go around it. Room services are good. The staff was soo friendly. Rooms are small but nicely decorated. You cant expect a bigger room for the same rates in that area.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: Best Hyatt we've ever stayed in -- hands down. From the Front Desk agents, housekeeping, doorman, security to the spa employees -- these amazing people bend over backwards to accommodate the guest. Every person we encountered was extremely helpful and friendly. We had two queen beds (deluxe room) with breathtaking views. Comfy beds, down comforter and pillows. Slept like a baby. The shower was huge with two different water attachments (waterfall & spray nozzle). Only concern -- carpet was stained from heavy foot traffic. Must try Marilyn Monroe Spa -- VIP treatment worth the price. Restaurant in lobby was delicious for breakfast. This Hyatt is in the heart of Time Square close to all shopping and shows. Cannot wait to come back to NYC so we can stay at Hyatt Centric. Guess the secret is out now -- won't stay anywhere else while in NYC. Keep up the great work Hyatt--see you next time.

hotel_name: Hyatt Centric Times Square New York
review_body: If this is your first time traveling to New York like it was for us you NEEEEEED to stay at Hyatt Centric.
